segments.text: Do you want to know what really motivates Vince to be nice to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It isn't gratitude . It's fear . Vince is afraid I'll jump to a competitor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You wouldn't do that . Would you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I might . Vince knows he needs to keep me happy .
segments.speaker: S1
